ComicInfo.Summary:
NECESSARY EVIL continues as the Mighty Morphin Power Rangers finally come face to face with the Mastermind behind all of their recent problems-the evil Lord Zedd. Meanwhile, the newly launched Omega Power Ranger team is stranded on an unfamiliar planet with no hope of getting home!
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Reg | Regular Cover | Jamal Campbell | 1 | Var | Foil Variant Cover (Blue Ranger) | Goni Montes | 2 | Var | Trading Card Variant Cover (Blue Ranger) | Kris Anka (a) & Dylan Todd (d) | 3 | Var | Unlocked Story Variant Cover | Dan Mora (a), Ryan Parrott (w) & Ed Dukeshire (l) | 4 | RE | Jolzar Collectibles Exclusive Variant Cover | Diego Galindo | Missing |
